summary: Provides a command‑line framework for the Raster Vision platform, defining an abstract command interface and concrete commands for analysis, training, prediction, evaluation, chip generation, and bundling, together with configuration and builder classes that validate inputs and serialize settings via protobuf.
business_intent: Empowers users to orchestrate end‑to‑end geospatial deep‑learning pipelines—data preparation, model training, inference, evaluation, and packaging—through reproducible, configurable CLI commands.
